function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High concentration of covid-19 cases in a major wholesale market.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of alternative options to mitigate the transmission of the virus.","category":"Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for post-pandemic behaviors in public spaces.","category":"Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in following physical distancing norms in urban public spaces","category":"Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to enforce public norms and regulations in heavily dense urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of shutting down public spaces in densely populated areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic of covid-19 causing daily loss of lives and economic downturn","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmissibility of sars-cov-2 variants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological aversion to big crowds and necessary changes in public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation and natural light may lead to high humidity, increasing the risk of viruses sticking and spreading easily.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inflexible layout design may lead to inadequate access to daylight and natural light, impacting the overall health and well-being of occupants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of wet and living spaces may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of pathogens.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of greenery near living and working areas may impact mental well-being and stress levels of occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to green spaces in living areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper daylight in work/study areas may lead to increased drowsiness and reduced productivity, impacting overall impacting mental health and well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of separate sanitation facilities and buffer spaces may increase the risk of virus spread lockdown periods.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on natural ventilation may lead to inadequate air exchange, allowing viruses and particles to accumulate
